author: juneb
body:
OutputType attribute is missing from Get-ComputerInfo and is wrong in help. I have a fix ready.
## Steps to reproduce

```
PS C:\Program Files\PowerShell\6.0.0.9> (Get-Command Get-ComputerInfo).OutputType
PS C:\Program Files\PowerShell\6.0.0.9>
PS C:\Program Files\PowerShell\6.0.0.9> (Get-Help Get-ComputerInfo).returnValues | fl *

returnValue : @{description=System.Management.Automation.PSObject[]; type=@{uri=;
              name=Microsoft.PowerShell.Management.ComputerInfo; description=System.Management.Automation.PSObject[]}}
```
## Expected behavior

OutputType = Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.ComputerInfo, System.Management.Automation.PSObject
## Actual behavior

```
PS C:\Program Files\PowerShell\6.0.0.9> (Get-Command Get-ComputerInfo).OutputType
PS C:\Program Files\PowerShell\6.0.0.9>
PS C:\Program Files\PowerShell\6.0.0.9> (Get-Help Get-ComputerInfo).returnValues | fl *

returnValue : @{description=System.Management.Automation.PSObject[]; type=@{uri=;
              name=Microsoft.PowerShell.Management.ComputerInfo; description=System.Management.Automation.PSObject[]}}
```
## Environment data

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

``` powershell
> $PSVersionTable

Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      5.1.14905.1000
PSEdition                      Desktop
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
BuildVersion                   10.0.14905.1000
CLRVersion                     4.0.30319.42000
WSManStackVersion              3.0
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
```

comments.author: mirichmo
comments.body: @juneb If you have the fix ready, please submit a PR and we'll take a look.

comments.author: kilasuit
comments.body:
@mirichmo this looks to have been merged in so this can be closed - @juneb if you have in the commit or PR "Added x which fixes #<issuenumber>" then it when the PR is merged this will auto close the issue too :-)
 :+1:

title: OutputType attribute is missing from Get-ComputerInfo and is wrong in help
